description.value: Primary Energy: Space 4 (visual illusion + medium range + 15ft cube) Supporting Energy: Time 2 (duration 1 minute) Range: Medium, 60 ft. (15-foot cube) Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 6 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Create a visual illusory effect of object, creature, or phenomenon at medium range in 15ft cube. Can move illusory effect with action. No sound, smell, or other sensory elements. Physical interaction reveals illusory effect. Saving Throw: Perception vs Space Mastery (to disbelieve if suspicious) Success Scaling: 0 = fails, 1 = 1 round, 2 = full effect, 3 = 10 minutes, 4 = 30ft cube (1 hour)
